file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-06-04 - OBSERVER AUDIO JACKS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OBSERVER AUDIO JACKS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Observer-Audio Jack Panel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - RE- ALL 23-51-06-000-801-A MOVAL OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - IN- ALL 23-51-06-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Observer-Audio Jack Panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 35-10-10-000-801-A/400 CREW OXYGEN MASK - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Cockpit - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE In the cockpit - RH side, behind after the 1 Does the task copilot seat I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Pull the oxygen mask fully out of the stowage box to get access to the oxygen mask audio plug. Refer to AMM TASK 35-10-10-000-801-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Carefully remove the audio plug from the Observer-Audio Jack Panel (3). (3) Release the four dzus (1). (4) Carefully pull the Observer-Audio Jack Panel (3). (5) Disconnect the electrical connector (2). (6) Remove the Observer-Audio Jack Panel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Observer-Audio Jack Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 224 B DET. A 3. OBSERVER AUDIO 3. OBSERVER AUDIO JACK PANEL JACK PANEL 1. DZUS (4) 1. DZUS (4) 2. ELECTRICAL 2. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR CONNECTOR 1 DET. B DET. B 1 AIRCRAFT WITH ACTIVE-NOISE REDUCTION HEADSET EM145AMM230139B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Observer-Audio Jack Panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 35-10-10-400-801-A/400 CREW OXYGEN MASK - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Cockpit - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE In the cockpit - RH side, behind the copilot 1 Does the task seat I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (2). (2) Install the Observer-Audio Jack Panel (3) in its installation position. (3) Attach the four dzus (1). (4) Carefully install the oxygen mask audio plug to the Observer-Audio Jack Panel (3). (5) Put on the observer oxygen mask and do a test of the microphone of the mask. (6) Put the oxygen mask into the stowage box. Refer to AMM TASK 35-10-10-400-801-A/ 400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-06 Page 6 of 6 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
